system.description:
What a mind you have! You embody both cleverness and scholarship. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Intelligence score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • Half your savant levels count as scholar levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.luapp6zqydhkeemn]{Defensive Studies} feature.
  • Half your scholar levels count as savant levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.asjk6epfoj4vtdhk]{Developed Poise} feature
  • You gain the following feature:

Think Ahead

Your brilliance is such that you can set up attacks to threaten another enemy, even if they miss their initial target. When you miss with an attack, you can use your reaction to immediately make the same attack (with a new die roll) against a different target. Once you have used this feature a number of times equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum 1), you can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in savant, 3 levels in scholar
